reference: Fast zwei Jahre, nachdem ein Student während eines schikanösen Rituals einer Studentenverbindung in Pocono Mountains, Pennsylvania, verstarb, werden Mordanklagen gegen fünf Personen eingereicht.

sentence: Kingfisher posted a fall in both half-year profit and sales after the group shouldered the cost of shutting stores.

reference: Kingfisher vermeldete einen Rückgang beim Halbjahresgewinn und den Umsätzen, nachdem die Gruppe die Kosten für das Schließen der Läden schulterte.

sentence: We will also need sufficient housing space to accommodate the influx of refugees over the next decades.

sentence: After the discussion aired, social media exploded in disapproval over Damon's comments.

sentence: Presenter and travel writer Ian Wright, 51, from Suffolk, scraped his tongue along a Euro note, a Piccadilly Circus hand rail, a train toilet's flush button and a Russian public telephone to prove the strength of his immune system.
paraphrase: Presenter and travel writer Ian Wright, 51, from Suffolk, scraped his tongue along a Euro note, a Piccadilly Circus hand rail, a train toilet's flush button and a Russian public telephone for proof of the strength of his immune system.

sentence: After he had beaten 16 rivals from within the Republican camp, doubt is now growing as to whether he will be successful in the race for the White House.

sentence: The White House Military Office requested the helicopter's presence in a fragmentary order, or FRAGO, barely 36 hours before the helicopter landed on the South Lawn for the "unusual" event, according to the records of Marine Helicopter Squadron One (HMX-1), the unit responsible for operating the helicopter.
paraphrase: The White House Military Office requested the helicopter's presence in a fragmentary order, or FRAGO, barely 36 hours before the helicopter 's landing on the South Lawn for the "unusual" event, according to the records of Marine Helicopter Squadron One (HMX-1), the unit responsible for operating the helicopter.
reference: Das Militärbüro des Weißen Hauses verlangte die Anwesenheit des Hubschraubers in einer fragmentarischen Ordnung oder FRAGO, kaum 36 Stunden bevor der Hubschrauber auf dem South Lawn landete, nach den Aufzeichnungen des Marine Helicopter Squadron One (HMX-1), der Einheit, die für den Betrieb des Hubschraubers verantwortlich ist.
